name: Birthlake
description:
__________________________________________________________________________________

Brief Horror Tales: Birthlake is a horror game located in the motel Birthlake.

After the car accident you will have to find help in the nearest building - motel Birthlake.

The map leads you towards the source of danger - ghost of the young girl, that controls everybody in the motel and tries to kill you.

After you get caught, you will decide between death or life.

This is the Chapter 1 of the Brief Horror Tales

__________________________________________________________________________________
